name: Metakgp
body:
### What is Metakgp?
Metakgp is a loose association of engineers, hackers, artists, and students from [IIT Kharagpur](http://www.iitkgp.ac.in/), who collaborate on various technical and non-technical projects.

We celebrate freedom and openness; all our projects are [free as in speech](http://www.gnu.org/philosophy/free-sw.en.html) (and usually beer too).

### Some of our projects

- [Metakgp Wiki](https://wiki.metakgp.org/): The community wiki for IIT Kharagpur, and our flagship project.

- [Question Paper Search](http://metakgp.github.io/mfqp): Instant search through previous years' question papers.

- [KGP TnP Noticeboard](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/kgp-tnp-noticeboard): A Google Group where notices put up on the T&P noticeboard are mirrored, along with attachments. Subscribe for regular updates.

- [The Kharagpur Documentation Project](https://wiki.metakgp.org/w/Metakgp:The_Kharagpur_Documentation_Project): A collection of interviews of the non-student residents of IIT KGP.

### Getting involved

Curious? Drop by to say hi, we hang out on [Slack](http://slack-invite.metakgp.org).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
